title: Samples, ca. 1910
dimensions:
a. Warp: 22 cm [8.5"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 64.5 cm [25.5"] Selvedge right side,cut other side.
b. Warp: 18 cm [7"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 64.5 cm [25.5"] Selvedge right side,cut other side. 
c. Warp: 22.5 cm [9"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 26 cm [10"]  Cut both sides.
d. Warp: 22.5 cm [9"]  Cut top  and bottom.
    Weft: 25.5 cm [10"] Selvedge right side, cut other side.
e. Warp: 22.5 cm [9"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 25.5 cm [10"]  Cut both sides.
f.  Warp: 22 cm [9 3/4"] Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 26 cm [10"] Selvedge right side, cut other side.
g. Warp: 21.5 cm [8.5"] Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 26 cm [10"]  Cut both sides.
creditline: Gift of Margaret and Teresa Gloster in memory of Mary and Margaret McElligott
description:
a. green ground with pink flowers and dark green leaves and stems
b. beige ground with pink flowers and green leaves
c. dark red ground with gold/beige flowers and dark green leaves and stems
d. rust color ground with gold/beige flowers and dark green leaves and stems
e. orange/pink ground with white flowers and green leaves and stems
f. green ground with gold/beige flowers and dark red leaves and stems
g. gold/beige ground with orange/pink flowers and green leaves and stems
